com.example.android.funkytasks

Class ToSolveTasksFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.example.android.funkytasks.ToSolveTasksFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ToSolveTasksFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    This fragment displays all the tasks a user has been accepted for and must now solve.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateView

        public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                      android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Creates the view and allows the user to interact with it. This function also finds and displays all the tasks that a given user has to solve and states what happens when they select one of these tasks.
        Overrides:
        onCreateView in class android.support.v4.app.Fragment
        Parameters:
        inflater - a layout inflator that helps the view display
        container - a view group that states where the view should be displayed
        savedInstanceState - a bundle representing the most recent save state of the app
        Returns:
        returns a view

      • setListViewAdapter

        public void setListViewAdapter(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasklist)
        Sets the list view adapter to the proper adapter so that the objects can be displayed properly
        Parameters:
        tasklist - an array list holding all the tasks

      • getTask

        public void getTask()
        Adds the tasks that the user has bid on the the list of tasks so they can be accessed by the rest of the class

      • taskOnClick

        public void taskOnClick(int i)
        States what happens when an item in the list is clicked on. The tasks details are loaded and a new intent is started.
        Parameters:
        i - an integer representing the index of the item in the list
